Class Filter1GapFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • Filter
      • Filter1GapFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Filter1GapFinder
extends Filter
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class used to read in a DNA sequence to edit from the console. After reading it in it adds each sequence to the buffer
    Author:
    Kyle Dorcey

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Primary logic behind this filter. Loops through every character of the users input. If a character is "A", "T","G", or "C" it will be added to a temporary string. If the character is an "N" the temporary string is added to the buffer and the temporary string is reset to "".
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
